piper_naim: This is so embarrassing, but I have never owned any yoga clothing (see, I'm not even sure how to name then correctly). I have been over weight my entire life and was never allowed to wear anything form fitting. I was forced to wear baggy mens shorts and big and tall tshirts if I played any sports or exercised, so it just kind of stuck with me as an adult. I would absolutely love to try some yoga pants and tops. I love the colors and they look super soft. Hopefully, I can start an exercise regimen soon, and these would definitely give me some confidence to enter a gym. So it's kind of like I'm experiencing 2 things for the first time, wearing form fitting active wear and joining a gym. Im scared, but I know I can do it. Also, thank you for this opportunity and my apologies for the lengthy post. I know I must seem like a real weirdo for never wearing lwggings or yoga pants, but I am so willing to try.
runnchel: I love love love wearing them around the house listening to podcasts, cleaning and sitting in my woman cave. Then, when I need to go out I don't bother changing because I know I'll be home soon 😅
sassy_britches78: I don’t own yoga clothes because they’d never been available in my size that I knew of. Yoga spaces I’ve tried to be a part of, have at times(more often than not) been very intimidating because while the yoga instructors in my community have extended a welcome, there was a layer of thinly veiled judgement in the language used to lead the class. If I didn’t feel fat enough upon arrival in old shorts, and the requisite fat girl blobby sports bra and tank, I knew by mid pose that I was being looked at as a behemoth in predominantly thin space. These days I still don’t wear yoga clothes but looking your modeling of the clothes and the @beyondyoga website, I have hope I can own a pair of real yoga pants and yoga top.

classy_casie: I love to wear them when wirking out and lounging around the house!
allyouneedisluff: What a treat! I love that brands are finally realizing we all need clothes for movement! Like fat bodies don’t yoga!? I love to incorporate them into my lifestyle, I’m always on the go so having something I can easily incorporate into an outfit I’m already wearing is a huge plus!
fallonmichelle__: Love wearing them during my early morning flows ❤️
devilscat1: I've been trying to stay healthy by going on more walks and just getting out more. I have never owned anything like these and would love love love to try them out 😍🥰

lady.britt: I love to wear them everywhere I go 😂
synapsefizz: I LIVE in my yoga clothes on my days off, I will even throw on a hoodie and feel comfortable take the kids to school, Althlesuire wear is my faveeeeee 😍 I hope yoga pants is a trend that will never die. ❤️🥳
cal1cok1tten: I wear yoga pants/bras/etc pretty much daily. I work as a labor and delivery nurse so I have to change into scrubs at the hospital. When I roll outta bed I can put on comfy clothes to wear into work.

bailey_amis: I love to wear my yoga clothes both for comfy laying around the house and for movement that makes me feel strong like yoga and barre!
fecundmind: I loooove wearing leggings with skirts or dresses. They’re like an ultra comfy under-layer that allows any outfit to feel good but can be dressed up!
anji.glitters: I love comfortable clothes and would love to have some that fit well to work out in. I wear them when I'm on my elliptical and when I'm using my weights.
itsjustmona: I wear them to run errands, lounge around the house, workout, and to hangout. Soooo basically for everything. Lol
kelseyleach1997: I love to wear yoga clothes to do absolutely anything!
mrsplowman127: I want to wear ALL the yoga clothes while doing yoga to improve my mobility.

etcbritt: Drinking kombucha on a patio with my rescue pitbulls❤️🐕
rayscreams: I love wearing my yoga clothes to the gym, and to the beach
bravetobetter: Yoga clothes are life. em_is4cr: I Adore this outfit and comfy is a MUST for me! I love soft lounge, workout, and yoga clothes that fit well. I want things I can wear to run errands, take a walk, work in the garden AND be comfortable getting cozy and watching a movie in!!!💕💕💕

kmilideo: Going to lots of physical therapy for recent back surgery! Yoga clothing is perfect for PT and comfy recovery.
